DOC.brief_summary: A phase I clinical trial compare pharmacokinetics safety fimasartan/Atorvastatin combination tablet coadministration fimasartan Atorvastatin healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetic Interaction Between Fimasartan Atorvastatin Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: After subject sign informed consent voluntarily , go screening period within 21 day . Group 1 period 2 period 3 period A F A F+A B F F+A A C A F+A F D A F F+A E F+A F A F F+A A F At period take Fimasartan , subject Group blood sample 0 , 0.25 , 0.5 , 0.75 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 , 24 48 hour medication ( 15 time period ) . At period take Atorvastatin , subject Group blood sample 0 , 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 , 24 48 hour medication ( 12 time period ) . At period take Fimasartan Atorvastatin , subject Group blood sample 0 , 0.25 , 0.5 , 0.75 , 1 , 1.5 , 2 , 2.5 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 , 24 48 hour medication ( 15 time period ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject , age 19 50 year screen . 2 . Body weight 19.0 28.0 ideal body weight ( IBW ) ( kg ) = { height ( cm ) 100 } * 0.9 1 . History illness may affect absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion ( hepatobiliary , renal , cardiovascular , endocrine ( e.g. , hypothyroidism ) , respiratory , gastrointestinal , hematooncology , central nervous system , psychiatric musculoskeletal system ) 2 . Hypotension ( systolic ≤ 100 mmHg diastolic ≤ 65 mmHg ) hypertension ( systolic ≥ 140 mmHg diastolic ≥ 90 mmHg ) , measure screen 3 . Evidence hereditary disease , include galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency , glucosegalactose malabsorption . 4 . History gastrointestinal disease ( i.g. , Crohn 's disease , active peptic ulcer ) resection operation may affect absorption study drug ( exclude simple appendectomy herniorrhaphy ) ] 5 . Participation study within 2 month prior first administration study drug ( The finish time previous study day last administration study drug )
